tagline:
Masters student with 5 years of fullstack development experience 
seeking internship position in user experience design.

education.degree: Master of Information Management and Systems
Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Engineering

points: Successfully managed over 10 web/mobile projects for clients in private and public sector of Thailand
Parter with clients to determine design solution crafted towards their users and business requirements
Produce wireframes, high-fidelity mockups and conduct user research (interviews, focus groups, card sorting) for client projects
Supervise a team of developers to meet development goals.
Design overall corporate brand identity, produce branding and PR materials such as logo, business card, pitch decks and video reels

Prototype and develop customized solutions for marketing and communications including mobile augmented reality applications on iOS and Android, web applications, interactive kiosks and immersive projection shows
Collaborate with designers and creative director to form technical solutions for the proposed design solutions
Supervise a team of outsourced developers and freelancers to meet development schedule

Conduct a feasibility research of implementing human-robot interaction with Microsoft Kinect on Robotino robot platform. Develop a TCP-based depth image streaming system from Robotino to Android devices
